title: Sir Elton John reveals he was cured of prostate cancer following secret diagnosis in new memoir
text:
Sir Elton John has revealed he has been cured of prostate cancer following a secret diagnosis two years ago.

The 72-year-old star decided not to undergo chemotherapy after he discovered he had the disease after a routine checkup in 2017.

Instead, he had surgery to remove his prostate so he could continue touring and not have to go back to hospital "dozens of times".

The operation was successful, but Sir Elton said he contracted a major infection 10 days later and was left "24 hours from death" when he was later struck down by a fever.

He writes about his health struggles for the first time in his new memoir Me, serialised in The Daily Mail.
description: Sir Elton John has revealed he has been cured of prostate cancer following a secret diagnosis two years ago.
